entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind light except gusting to 50 km/h at times. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind light except gusting to 50 km/h at times in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
